document.masterDocTitle: A review of the North and Central American Megachile subgenus Argyropile Mitchell (Hymenoptera: Megachilidae)

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution . Southwestern Canada (British Columbia – Saskatchewan), western USA to North Dakota, Indiana, North Carolina and Florida; Mexico and Costa Rica .

,

Associated organisms : The mite
Trochometridium tribulatum Cross
(Acari, Trochometridiidae) has been taken from legs, propodeum and metasoma of females. The same mite species has also been recorded from other ground-nesting bees (P. Klimov, Pers . com).
